item.title: CVE-2019-4036|2024-08-04T19:26:27.962Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance could allow unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service in the reverse proxy component. IBM X-Force ID: 156159.
